commit.message:
[VolvoOnCall] OH3 update

Solving issue #  and issue #
Some code corrections and enhancements.
Introduced new trigger channels.

Moving back to Jetty HttpClient
Introduced Expiring cache for request to avoid flooding voc servers
Reduced the number of requests emitted
Changed  user agent identification

Signed-off-by: clinique <gael@lhopital.org>

nodes.bodyText: If you received an interrupt you shouldn't schedule more things. Typically an interrupt indicates a shutdown is occurring.
If this actually works then I have no problem with this change.
Why are the units in volume/distance instance of distance/volume? Is this just a Volvo thing?
